title: My Monster Life
description: It's time to get to grips with un-life at the school where screams come true! This book will take you through the whole horrorific year at Monster High. You'll find dates for your die-ary to keep up with all the comings and groanings, plus student of the month profiles and updates on extra-scare-icular activities. Today is going to be fangtastic!
author: Parragon Books
